argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ltrmynn0 | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 /\ b e. NN0 ) -> ( a < b <-> ( A rmY a ) < ( A rmY b ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. NN0 /\ b e. NN0 ) -> ( a < b -> ( A rmY a ) < ( A rmY b ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_frmy | |- rmY : ( ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) X. ZZ ) --> ZZ |
| 4 | 3 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY a ) e. ZZ ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_zred | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ a e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY a ) e. RR ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rmyneg | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ b e. ZZ ) -> ( A rmY -u b ) = -u ( A rmY b ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = M -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY M ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = N -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY N ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = b -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY b ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( a = -u b -> ( A rmY a ) = ( A rmY -u b ) ) |
| 11 | 2, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 | #P_monotoddzz | |- ( ( A e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M < N <-> ( A rmY M ) < ( A rmY N ) ) ) |
